Education.description: Honours Bachelor of Science specializing in Computer Science

Work Experience.description: Over the course of my work term, I collaborated in a remote, agile team environment and contributed to all phases of the SDLC. I mainly worked on progressing an existing web application, RAMP4, and planning/developing a new web application, TABS.

projects.name: RAMP4
contributions: Created and updated the appearance and functionality of UI components following WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines).
Created and deployed a static documentation site using VuePress and GitHub Pages.
Created and updated features of existing APIs such as the LegendAPI and InstanceAPI.
Tested and evaluated the pull requests of other contributors.

projects.name: TABS
contributions: Evaluated the project goals, audience, scope, purpose, and timeline.
Defined the app content, functional requirements, and tool stack.
Designed the UI and created a high-fidelity prototype using Figma and feedback from clients.

Personal Projects.name: PokeFinder
Personal Projects.description: A web application that finds and displays data from user input using read-only data from PokeAPI.
features: Fetches and displays images, data tables, and graphs of a specified pokemon.
Users can save a list of pokemon for easy data access.

Personal Projects.name: CryptoTracker
Personal Projects.description: A high-fidelity Figma prototype of the dashboard for a cryptocurrency web application.
features: Design prioritizes user experience, personalization, and accessibility.
Interactive desktop and mobile prototypes for usability testing.

Personal Projects.name: NoteBoard
Personal Projects.description: A note-taking web application that creates/reads/updates/deletes a user's notes on a cloud server.
features: Page designs are responsive to screen size and OS preferences of dark or light mode.

Personal Projects.name: Portfolio
Personal Projects.description: A web application that displays static information about my experience.
features: Page designs are responsive to screen size and OS preferences of dark or light mode.
Users can send a message to my email through the form on the 'Contact' page.
